title: [Large-Scale] Science Inquiry Competency Enhancement Program Using Problem-Based Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Scientific Principles and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Constructivist approach program focused on adult learners solving science problems encountered in daily life. Structured activities designed to facilitate peer collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can derive key variables from real scientific problems with 80% accuracy
Learners can generate and evaluate scientific solutions three or more times through peer collaboration
Learners can systematically document problem-solving processes using online tools and submit them with over 90% completion rate
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
